meanings.definition: Not exempt from a rule or obligation.
meanings.sent1: Employees in this category are nonexempt and must clock in and out.
meanings.sent2: The nonexempt items were subject to additional taxes.
meanings.sent3: It's like being in a nonexempt club where everyone has to follow the same strict rules.
meanings.sent4: Her nonexempt status meant she had to attend the meeting, even on her day off.
meanings.sent5: The nonexempt workers were the backbone of the company, always present and accountable.

meanings.definition: Not excluded or immune from something.
meanings.sent1: The nonexempt students had to take the same test as everyone else.
meanings.sent2: Certain foods are nonexempt from the new dietary guidelines.
meanings.sent3: Even the king was nonexempt from paying taxes in this kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The nonexempt areas of the city were hit hardest by the storm.
meanings.sent5: The virus spread rapidly, affecting both exempt and nonexempt individuals alike.
